text: True or False: Triangles can have 2 obtuse angles.
explanation: False - sum of angles = 180°, so max 1 obtuse angle

text: True or False: Triangles can have 2 perpendicular sides.
explanation: True - right-angled triangles have 2 perpendicular sides

text: True or False: Triangles can have 2 parallel sides.
explanation: False - triangles have no parallel sides

text: From a temperature graph, the temperature at 10:30 am was between 17°C and 21°C. What was it?
explanation: Reading from graph at 10:30 am gives approximately 19°C

text: For how long was the temperature 25°C or higher?
explanation: From graph: temperature ≥ 25°C from 12pm to 2pm = 2 hours

explanation: A: 3/4 for 4. B: 1/6 for 4. False - 4 is MORE likely on A

text: Two presents cost $120 total. One costs twice the other. Price of the expensive one?

explanation: If August 21 is a weekday, count to next Saturday

text: Ryan's birthday is September 10th. August 21st was Thursday. What day is September 10th?
explanation: Count forward 20 days from Thursday = Wednesday

text: A string has 10 beads: some white, some colored. What fraction are white?
explanation: Count white beads out of total 10

explanation: Angles on a straight line sum to 180 degrees.

explanation: Yuri must be even and > 15. 16 is possible.

explanation: Tiles are 4x4 and 6x6. Perimeter is 32 cm.

explanation: The number must be between 23 and 27.

explanation: Move the decimal point two places to the left.

explanation: 64 is the product of 8 multiplied by 8.

explanation: All multiples of 6 are multiples of 3.
